content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; furnace_source holds available iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; fuel inventory includes coal (energy: 1600) and furnace result contains copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs for research; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id updated to 3104.
- ElectricityGroup with id=3104 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15° with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); fluid_system updated to [10084].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system updated to [10084].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10084 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10085 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10086 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10091 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10090 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10095 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10094 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=10097 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Incorrect PipeGroup Fluid System Usage:
  - Multiple connection attempts using non-active fluid_system IDs [9740, 9783, 9826, 9869, 9912, 9955, 9998, 10041] result in aborted operations.
  - Tip: Validate and target the active fluid_system (e.g., 10084 in the updated configuration) before initiating any connection.

• Redundant Pipeline Stabilization Delays:
  - Repeated 10-second wait periods after failed connection attempts do not resolve connectivity issues.
  - Tip: Verify pipeline alignment and operational status prior to employing delays to avoid unnecessary idle time.

• Unresolved Steam Engine Connectivity:
  - Despite numerous connection attempts, the steam engine remains disconnected from both the power network and water input.
  - Tip: Reassess connection points and pipeline integration to ensure proper linkage and fluid delivery.
